title: Chocolate chip cookie cake
ingredients: ['110g butter, softened', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '150g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '170g plain chocolate chips', '2 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons milk', '125g icing sugar', '60g pecan halves', '100g Smarties or M&Ms', '25g desiccated coconut', '60g white chocolate, melted']
